target.description: Access custom GPTs through ChatGPT GPT Store

@graph.name: How to Use OptizenAI Custom GPTs
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to accessing and using OptizenAI custom GPT tools for SEO and ecommerce optimization

step.name: Access GPT Store
step.text: Visit the ChatGPT GPT Store and search for OptizenAI custom GPTs

step.name: Select Appropriate GPT
step.text: Choose the custom GPT that matches your specific need (SEO, ecommerce, content creation)

step.name: Input Your Content
step.text: Upload or paste your content, product data, or requirements into the selected GPT

step.name: Generate Optimized Output
step.text: Receive SEO-optimized content, product descriptions, or marketing materials ready for use

mainEntity.name: Do I need a ChatGPT account to use these custom GPTs?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, you need a ChatGPT account to access and use the custom GPTs available in the GPT store.

mainEntity.name: Are these custom GPTs compatible with Shopify and WooCommerce?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, several GPTs are specifically designed for ecommerce platforms including Shopify and WooCommerce, such as the Product Internal Linking List and Image Alt Text Optimization tools.

mainEntity.name: Can I use these GPTs with other AI tools like SurferSEO?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, the Semantic Outline Generator creates outlines that are ready to use with AI tools such as ChatGPT or SurferSEO, as well as for human writers and virtual assistants.

mainEntity.name: What types of content can these GPTs optimize?

acceptedAnswer.text: The GPTs can optimize various content types including SEO articles, press releases, ecommerce product descriptions, category page content, image alt text, and internal linking structures.

@graph.name: Our Custom GPTs - OptizenAI
@graph.description: Explore OptizenAI's collection of custom GPT tools for SEO optimization, ecommerce content creation, and digital marketing automation.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Semantic SEO
hasDefinedTerm.description: Search engine optimization approach that focuses on topic relevance and semantic relationships between keywords and content themes

hasDefinedTerm.name: Internal Linking
hasDefinedTerm.description: SEO practice of linking between pages within the same website to improve navigation and distribute page authority

hasDefinedTerm.name: Alt Text Optimization
hasDefinedTerm.description: Process of creating descriptive alternative text for images to improve accessibility and SEO performance

hasDefinedTerm.name: Custom GPT
hasDefinedTerm.description: Specialized AI assistant trained for specific tasks and workflows, available through the ChatGPT platform
